Hi, my name is aly

I'm a self-proclaimed UX unicorn. Although I do enjoy rainbows and sparkles, I have more than just glitter to back it up.

UX Designer • Web Developer • Unicorn

I have stellar frontend development skills including HTML5, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, Django, and Git. On top of all that, I'm a fully-trained graphic designer who has spent years improving her UX skills. I have experience with persona mapping, wireframing, low-fi and hi-fi prototyping, and user testing.

Whew!! That's a lot! I've had about 10 years to build up that skills list, and I'm proud to say that I'm continuing to add to it.

Want to know more about me? Let's chat!
